# Reclaim Media

> AI-powered creative studio creating music, stories, and digital experiences using cutting-edge AI technology. Founded by Rudi Ribeiro Jr.

## About
- AI-powered creative studio based in the United States
- Creates AI music artists with full personas, original music, and authentic storytelling
- Also produces books, courses, and digital content
- Founded by Rudi Ribeiro Jr., technologist and enterprise sales professional

## Artists

### Dakota Rose
- Genre: Country music from Nashville
- Debut Album: "Heart Wide Open" (12 tracks)
- Style: Heartfelt country storytelling with powerful vocals
- Streaming: Available on Spotify, YouTube, Apple Music
- [Dakota Rose Artist Page](https://reclaimmedia.co/dakota-rose): Full track listing and bio
- [Lyrics](https://reclaimmedia.co/dakota-rose/lyrics/index.html): Complete lyrics
- [Song Meanings](https://reclaimmedia.co/dakota-rose/meaning/3-am.html): Analysis
- [Guitar Chords](https://reclaimmedia.co/dakota-rose/chords/index.html): All songs

### Colby Hayes
- Genre: Indie Pop / Bedroom Pop
- Debut Album: "Static" (10 tracks)
- Style: Emotional, vulnerable songwriting
- [Colby Hayes Artist Page](https://reclaimmedia.co/colby-hayes): Bio and music

## Books
- [The Personal Agent Revolution](https://reclaimmedia.co/books/agent-revolution): Building Your Own AI Agent with OpenClaw by Rudi Ribeiro Jr. ($29.95)
